mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where loginAct=#{loginAct} and loginPwd=#{loginPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user( id, loginAct, name, loginPwd, email, expireTime, lockState, deptno, allowIps, createTime, createBy )values ( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{name}, #{loginPwd}, #{email}, #{expireTime}, #{lockState}, #{deptno}, #{allowIps}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
